page.title: 02Our School
page.content: Our School opened for the first time on January 17,1876 with 40 pupils. 110 years later in January 1986 60 of us will leave the School temporarily to allow extension and remodelling work to be carried out.The old School House will be incorporated in the building and Mrs.North,our old school caretaker will be rehoused near her son.We are all very pleased that we are having a new school as we might have been shut and all of us would have had to go to a bigger school on a bus.There was a big meeting in the Village Hall about our School and all the villagers said why they wanted to keep our school.Some said the village would lose its heart and the mum's would not be able to talk to each other at the beginning and end of the day.
